content:
When I validate a QuestionnaireResponse against:
http://fhirtest.uhn.ca/baseDstu3/QuestionnaireResponse/$validate
I get a 500: Unexpected failure while validating resource

When I create the same QR, it is created without problems at:
http://fhirtest.uhn.ca/baseDstu3/QuestionnaireResponse/192978
Other QR validations work, this QR references a Q which references a ValueSet. Maybe there's something wrong in the Q or VS, but the 500 does not help.
